parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Vertex at which to set the Distance 2 radius

parameters.name: Dist2
parameters.description: Distance 2 radius at the vertex specified by PFilletItem

title: IVariableFilletFeatureData2.SetDistance
description: Sets the Distance 2 radius for this asymmetric fillet.
signature:
void SetDistance( 
   System.Object
PFilletItem
,
   System.Double
Dist2
)

parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Vertex at which to set the Distance 2 radius

parameters.name: Dist2
parameters.description: Distance 2 radius at the vertex specified by PFilletItem

remarks:
Call
IVariableFilletFeatureData2::SetRadius
to set the Distance 1 radius at the vertex.
